data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Löcker, Birgit (2015): Revision of the Australian species of Aka White, 1879 (Fulgoromorpha: Cixiidae) with the description of a new genus. Zootaxa 3956 (2): 199-223, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3956.2.3
